en-US.summary: A trivia game to test your Fallout 4 video game knowledge
examplePhrases: Alexa ask fallout four trivia to start a game
Alexa tell fallout four trivia I want to play
en-US.name: fallout four trivia
en-US.description: This is an unofficial Fallout 4 trivia game, meant to test your knowledge of all different aspects of the game. Answers are multiple choice, say the number of the answer to guess. All sounds and icons are owned by and belong to Bethesda Softworks. I claim no credit for any intellectual property or assets used in this skill
